uvi.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.77
uvi.description:
regmap: Fix possible double-free in regcache_rbtree_exit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.77 by commit 36e911a16b377bde0ad91a8c679069d0d310b1a6, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 3f4ff561bc88b074d5e868dde4012d89cbb06c87. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: regmap: Fix possible double-free in regcache_rbtree_exit()
